page.title: 18NEW ROMNEY PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: AT OUR SCHOOL WE PLAY MANY DIFFERENT PLAYGROUND GAMES HERE ARE SOME OF THEM.DOCTOR DOCTOR WE PLAY IT WITH AT LEAST THREE PEOPLE.ONE PERSON IS THE DOCTOR,THE OTHERS JOIN HANDS IN A RING AND TWIST AND TURN.NEXT THEY SHOUT DOCTOR DOCTOR AND THE DOCTOR TRIES TO GET THEM BACK IN A RING ANOTHER GAME IS HAD.YOU PLAY IT WITH TWO OR MORE PEOPLE.ONE PERSON IS ON IT AND THEY TOUCH SOMEONE,THEN THAT PERSON IS ON IT AND THE GAME CONTINUES.COLOUR IS PLAYED WITH THREE PEOPLE AND A ROPE. TWO PEOPLE CHOOSE A COLOUR AND THE OTHER PERSON KEEPS JUMPING OVER THE ROPE TRYING TO GUESS THE COLOUR. WE PLAY MANY MORE GAMES THESE ARE JUST THREE.
